text:
*[EDIT:* Answered the first question on my own by reading the plugin source — it can’t take the `--remove` flag because it doesn’t use `watch`. *]*

Is there a way to make `HubSpotAutoUploadPlugin` behave like `hs watch --remove`? I’d like files to be removed from the destination portal when they’re removed from the source. I figured that `hs watch` is probably powering it under the hood, but passing `--remove` gives an “Unknown option” error.

I also noticed that the URL for the `@HubSpot/webpack-cms-plugins` GitHub repo redirects to the `@HubSpot/HubSpot-cli` repo now — have the Webpack plugins been depreciated?
